Name: {{ currentModule?.nameModule }}

Crédit: {{ currentModule?.credit }}

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { ServiceModuleService } from 'src/app/services/service-module.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-module-list', templateUrl: './module-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./module-list.component.css'] }) export class ModuleListComponent { list: any; module: { id: number; nameModule: string; credit: string; }[] = []; modalDisplay = false; currentModule: any = null; modalMode: 'edit' | 'view' = 'view'; // Utilisé pour différencier entre affichage et édition dans le modal ngOnInit(): void { this.getAllModules(); console.log("ok"); this.list=this.module; } constructor(private serviceModule: ServiceModuleService){} deleteModule(moduleId: number): void { this.serviceModule.deleteModule(moduleId).subscribe(response => { console.log('Module Deleted successfully', response); }, error => { console.error('There was an error!', error); }); } updateModule(moduleId: number, newData: any): void { this.serviceModule.updateModule(moduleId, newData).subscribe(response => { console.log('Module Updated successfully', response); }, error => { console.error('There was an error!', error); }); } getAllModules(): void { this.serviceModule.getModules().subscribe(modules => { this.list=modules; console.log('List of Modules:', modules); console.log('bravo'); }, error => { console.error('There was an error!', error); console.log("erreur msg" || error); }); } getModuleById(moduleId: number): void { this.serviceModule.getModuleById(moduleId).subscribe(module => { console.log('Module Details:', module); }, error => { console.error('There was an error!', error); }); } }
